earth.body:
@startuml
xearth(500,500)
'Fixed position
viewPositionType = Fixed
viewPosLat = 30.3
viewPosLong = 120.2
''Relative view from Sun
'viewPositionType = Sun-relative
'sunPosRelLat = -10
'sunPosRelLong = 40
''Relative view from Moon
'viewPositionType = Moon
'daySideBrightness = 100
'nightSideBrightness = 30
''View set by orbit
'viewPositionType = Orbit
'orbitPeriod = 1
'orbitInclination = 30
''Add more stars
'starsP = true
'starFrequency = 0.025
'bigStars = 20
''grid configuration
'gridP = true
'gridDivision = 9
'gridPixelDivision = 8
''shading
'shadeP = true
''grid
'gridP = true
''luminosity
'daySideBrightness = 100
'nightSideBrightness = 30
'terminatorDiscontinuity = 50
'Zooming
viewMagnification = 1
'Adding cities
39.92 116.43 "Beijing" # China
30.3 120.2 "Hangzhou" # China
@enduml
